sys:positions.title: Member of the House of Representatives
Deputy Prime Minister and Home Minister
Speaker of the House of Representatives

description: Ram Chandra Poudel is a veteran Nepali politician who was elected as the third President of Nepal on March 9, 2023 (Falgun 25, 2079 BS), as a candidate for a 10-party coalition, defeating Subaschandra Nemwang. He assumed office on March 13, 2023, resigning from his post as a Member of the House of Representatives. Poudel's long political career includes serving as the Speaker of the House of Representatives from 1994 to 1999 and as Deputy Prime Minister and Home Minister from 2000 to 2002. He was first elected to parliament from Tanahun-1 in 1991 and later represented Tanahun-2 for several terms. He returned to and won the Tanahun-1 seat in the 2022 general election.
short_description: Ram Chandra Poudel is a Nepali politician and the third and current president of Nepal. He is a former member of the House of Representatives, representing the Tanahun-1 constituency.
tags: Speaker of the House of Representatives
